title: ISaveBodyFeatureData.ReleaseSelectionAccess
description: Releases access to the selections that define this Save Bodies feature.
remarks:
ISaveBodiesFeatureData::AccessSelections
puts the model in a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define the feature.
Use this method to restore the rollback state if you did not modify the feature, or use
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
or
IFeature::IModifyDefinition2
if you did modify the feature.

examples.title: Get Number of Bodies in Save Bodies Feature (VBA)
